metadata.title: CVE-2018-1063 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
Context relabeling of filesystems is vulnerable to symbolic link attack,allowing a local, unprivileged malicious entity to change the SELinuxcontext of an arbitrary file to a context with few restrictions. This onlyhappens when the relabeling process is done, usually when taking SELinuxstate from disabled to enable (permissive or enforcing). The issue wasfound in policycoreutils 2.5-11.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-1063` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

newrole - 2.7-1
policycoreutils - 2.7-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: policycoreutils package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.7-1').
